text: is a railway station on the Tokyu Setagaya Line in Setagaya, Tokyo, Japan, operated by Tokyu Corporation. ==Station layout== The station consists of two side platforms serving two tracks. ===Platforms=== ==Adjacent stations== ==History== The station opened on January 18, 1925. ==Surrounding area== Wakabayashi Crossing *Wakabayashi Crossing ==External links== Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1925 Category:Tokyu Setagaya Line Category:Stations of Tokyu Corporation Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Wakabayashi Station (Tokyo)
